story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: You only see me as a challenger.
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You’re acting like you’re superior to me—as
if I wasn’t your equal!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
(What Benga said to Lance applies to
me too.)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
(It’s true if you lose the will to grow
stronger, you won’t be able to protect
those who need you.)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
(And if you’re in a position to guide people,
you must demonstrate stellar strength.)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
(Lance did that by defeating Benga and
making him recognize his strength.)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
(N did too. He proved his love for Pokémon
and awakened his arc suit.)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
(And then there’s Hilbert, who fought to
protect the world for both people and
Pokémon and changed N’s outlook.)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
(Do I have that kind of strength? Am I strong
enough to help people understand the
meaning of living with Pokémon?)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
(I can’t stay the way I am. I need to get
stronger and move forward!)
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Oh! Why, if it isn’t Benga!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
What’s the matter? You seem particularly
motivated today.
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: I’m gonna try to awaken my arc suit!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: Aw, c’mon! Why so surprised, Gramps?
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I saw Lance grow stronger with his
Dragonite...
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: and I watched him awaken his arc suit!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_2500_10: That made me wanna do the same!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
I wanna show everyone my bond with
Volcarona!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: I see... Is that what Volcarona wants?
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
We’re gonna grow stronger together!
Aren’t we, Volcarona?
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Oh, nothing. What you said just came out of
nowhere and caught me off guard, is all!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: So, you wanted me to train you?
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: Don’t hold back! Show me what you’ve got!
story_arceus_04_01000/2401_1001_3600_10: Hehe! That’s what I like to hear!
